ygData.subject: sylly's site
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey folks, If you haven t seen it, Sylly has a nice site. What caught my eye was her story:  Birth of a Bronze Bard . I ve been fortunate, belonging to two
ygData.messageBody:
Hey folks,

If you haven't seen it, Sylly has a nice site.

What caught my eye was her story: "Birth of a Bronze
Bard".

I've been fortunate, belonging to two very good guilds

(the Vikings and Seekers of Lore) and my guild
brothers and sisters have been kind, passing off items
they no longer need or just good advice.

Personally I dislike beggers but I also believe we
should help newbies out as well. It's good to see
that other people feel that way too.

her site:
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
